DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the additional use of non-fluoroscopic imaging modalities can decrease the use of radiation exposure during standard ablation procedures for supraventricular tachycardia (SVT) in children.
DOC.brief_title: Using Non-Fluoroscopic Imaging Devices to Decrease Radiation Exposure During Ablation of Supraventricular Tachycardia
DOC.criteria: Age >/=8 Weight >/=25kg Structurally normal heart (no major cardiac defects) History of SVT No prior history of cardiac surgery or ablation Congenital Heart Disease Prior history of cardiac surgery or ablation
